General.Name: Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited
General.Description: Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited, a textile company, manufactures and markets various fabric products in Thailand. The company provides T/R fabrics, spun T/C fabrics, filament fabrics, denim yarns, knitted fabrics, cords for rubber material reinforcement, airbag fabrics, and other yarns, as well as woven fabrics, canvas, and car seat fabrics. It also distributes its products in the United States, Canada, Europe, the Middle East, Africa, and Asia. The company was founded in 1960 and is headquartered in Bangkok, Thailand. Toray Textiles (Thailand) Public Company Limited is a subsidiary of Toray Industries, Inc.
